name: Nightingale Dying Commander
description:
Solo entry for GBJam5.

The king's most elite wariors. Trapped in a foreign land.

Made by Dries Vienne.
Title screen by Sacha Claeys.

Made in the course of 10 days, this was my first attempt at doing art and music for a game.
I specifically focused on presentation and world building.

Controls:

CTRL for camera panning,
ARROW KEYS for movement,
Holding SPACE + ARROW KEYS for slash attack (spans 2 tiles)

Release SPACE before releasing the ARROW key to

Can you lead your people home?

Hope you enjoy!
